name: Fanfiction Tools
short_description:
Enhances FanFiction.Net: autoloads chapters and lists, formats chapters and more.
An updated version of "Power Fanfiction.net" (http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/61979) by Ultimer.

Adds several features to Fanfiction.net:
 - Auto-closes the menus when you move the mouse away or click somewhere else
 - Loads the next chapter for you when you're nearing the end of this one
   Also, loads the next page of search results when nearing the end of the current page
 - Combines useful information together (like the chapters and words count, or the reviews count with the reviews page link)
 - Marks the words you choose in story summaries (edit the file to change them)
 - Formats dates in US/UK formats ("31/12/2011"), in relative formats ("yesterday" or "2 weeks ago"), and colors them according to the amount of time passed

Notes are in the support wiki
summary: A user script made to enhance reading at Fanfiction.net
